info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 6:07AM PDT until August 21 at 9:30AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 930 AM PDT. * At 607 AM PDT, Significant flooding is ongoing in the Mt Charleston area...With Kyle Canyon road currently impassable due to to flooding and ongoing flood related infrastructure damage. Rain persists in the area and flooding will persist through 930 am. Roads leading to Lee and Kyle Canyons are currently closed. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Las Vegas, Rainbow Canyon, Mt. Charleston, Spring Mountains, Hilltop Campground, Mahogany Grove Campground, Kyle Canyon Campground, Fletcher View Campground, Mary Jane Falls Campground, Dolomite Campground and Mcwilliams Campground. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
